meta.description: Optimize the number of commercials on streaming platforms to maximize audience reach within budget and platform constraints.

sets.name: PLATFORMS
sets.description: Streaming platforms where commercials can be run.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost of running a commercial on each platform.

params.name: reach
params.description: Audience reach of a commercial on each platform.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of commercials to run on each platform.

objective.name: max_audience_reach
objective.expr: x['Pi TV'] * reach['Pi TV'] + x['Beta Video'] * reach['Beta Video'] + x['Gamma Live'] * reach['Gamma Live']
objective.description: Maximize the total audience reach from commercials.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: x['Pi TV'] * cost['Pi TV'] + x['Beta Video'] * cost['Beta Video'] + x['Gamma Live'] * cost['Gamma Live']
constraints.description: Total cost of commercials must not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: beta_video_limit
constraints.description: Beta Video limits the number of commercials to 8.

constraints.name: gamma_live_limit
constraints.description: At most a third of all commercials should occur on Gamma Live.

constraints.name: pi_tv_minimum
constraints.description: At least 20% of all commercials should occur on Pi TV.
